Public Attributes

 An enumerator containing the names of all registered properties.

Detailed Description

Manager for system wide metadata properties.

Components should register properties with this service at startup.

See also:
sbIPropertyInfo

Get a property object from its name.

Parameters:
aName Name of the property
Returns:
Property object for the given property, null if not found

void sbIPropertyManager::addPropertyInfo ( in sbIPropertyInfo  aPropertyInfo  ) 

Add a property into the system.

Parameters:
aPropertyInfo Property to add into the system. An exception is thrown if the property's name is not unique

boolean sbIPropertyManager::hasProperty ( in AString  aName  ) 

Check for an property in the system by name.

Parameters:
aName Name of the property
Returns:
true if property is in system

false if property is not in system
